title: Studio apartment with all utilities included and parking!
posting_body: Spacious studio apartment in a very convenient location!
Please note: this apartment does not have a kitchen.
All utilities are included and 1 parking space is also included.
There's also a massive walk-in closet perfect for storage.
Walking distance to the commuter rail and express bus plus all of the shops and restaurants that Newtonville has to offer.
Call Jack for an in person tour today.
